# 题目

实现一个 `wrap_string` 函数，遍历给定字符串中的每个单词，如果当前行的长度超过了 `text_width::Int=10`，那么在末尾单词前插入换行符。提供给一个例子

```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width::Int = 10)
    lines = [split(line)[1:end-1] for line in split(text)]
    new_lines = Vector{String}()
    for line in lines
        current_line = ""
        for word in split(line)
            if length(current_line) + length(word) <= text_width
                current_line *= " $word"
            else
                push!(new_lines, current_line)
                current_line = word
            end
        end
        push!(new_lines, current_line)
    end
    return join(new_lines, "\n")
end

# 示例
text = "Hello there this is a very long sentence that should be wrapped to fit within the text width"
println(wrap_string(text))
```

输出应该类似于：

```
Hello there this is a very long sentence
that should be wrapped to fit within the text width
```
